issue.title: [CF 747] Condition "Icon Hidden" Bug
issue.body:
The icon will react whenever I unlock/lock my auras. I assume this is because it senses the icon is hidden, then when it reacts with its set conditions when I hide all icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jastain | Imported from CurseForge issue #747 | Raw
